dyimagefx

Class ImageFX

  • java.lang.Object
    • dyimagefx.ImageFX

  • public class ImageFX
extends java.lang.Object
    File: ImageFX.java Description: This file contains common image processing methods.

      • HSI_createHSIImage

        public static void HSI_createHSIImage(MyImage img)
        This method will replace the RGB value of each pixel with the HSI value.
        Parameters:
        img - The image whose HSI image is created.

      • HSI_changeImageHue

        public static void HSI_changeImageHue(MyImage img,
                      double hue)
        This method will change the hue value of the image. This method is using HSI (Hue-Saturation-Intensity) color model.
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.
        hue - The hue value to set in degree [0-360]

      • HSI_changeImageSaturation

        public static void HSI_changeImageSaturation(MyImage img,
                             double saturation)
        This method will change the saturation value of the image. This method is using HSI (Hue-Saturation-Intensity) color model.
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.
        saturation - The saturation value [0-1]

      • HSI_changeImageIntensity

        public static void HSI_changeImageIntensity(MyImage img,
                            double intensity)
        This method will change the intensity value of the image. This method is using HSI (Hue-Saturation-Intensity) color model.
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.
        intensity - The intensity value [0-255]

      • HSV_changeImageHue

        public static void HSV_changeImageHue(MyImage img,
                      double hue)
        This method will change the hue of the image. This method is using HSV (Hue-Saturation-Value) color model.
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.
        hue - The hue value to set in degree [0-360]

        This method will change the value of the image. This method is using HSV (Hue-Saturation-Value) color model.
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.
        value - The value [0-1]

        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.
        hue - The hue value to set in degree [0-360]

      • transparentAllPixels

        public static void transparentAllPixels(MyImage img,
                        int alpha)
        This method will change the transparency (alpha) of all the pixels of the image. Works well with .png files.
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.
        alpha - The alpha value [0-255] to set in each pixels of the image.

      • transparentAlphaPixels

        public static void transparentAlphaPixels(MyImage img,
                          int alpha)
        This method will change the transparency (alpha) of those pixels which have alpha value greater than 0. Works well with .png files.
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.
        alpha - The alpha value [0-255] to set in each pixels of the image.

      • grayScale_Average

        public static void grayScale_Average(MyImage img)
        This method will turn color image to gray scale image. It will set the RGB value of the pixel to (R+G+B)/3
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.

      • grayScale_Lightness

        public static void grayScale_Lightness(MyImage img)
        This method will turn color image to gray scale image. In this method GrayScale = (max(R, G, B) + min(R, G, B)) / 2.
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.

      • grayScale_Luminosity

        public static void grayScale_Luminosity(MyImage img)
        This method will turn color image to gray scale image. This method uses the formula GrayScale = 0.2126*R + 0.7152*G + 0.0722*B
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.

      • grayScale_setRGBValueToRedValue

        public static void grayScale_setRGBValueToRedValue(MyImage img)
        This method will turn color image to gray scale image. It will set the RGB value of the pixel to red value of the pixel.
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.

      • grayScale_setRGBValueToGreenValue

        public static void grayScale_setRGBValueToGreenValue(MyImage img)
        This method will turn color image to gray scale image. It will set the RGB value of the pixel to green value of the pixel.
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.

      • grayScale_setRGBValueToBlueValue

        public static void grayScale_setRGBValueToBlueValue(MyImage img)
        This method will turn color image to gray scale image. It will set the RGB value of the pixel to blue value of the pixel.
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.

      • createRandomImage

        public static void createRandomImage(MyImage img)
        This method will create a random image.
        Parameters:
        img - The image object that will hold the random image.

      • createColorImage

        public static void createColorImage(MyImage img,
                    int color)
        This method will color the entire image with a given color.
        Parameters:
        img - The image object.
        color - The color value.

      • crop

        public static void crop(MyImage img,
        int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int height)
        This method will crop the image img.
        Parameters:
        img - The image to crop.
        x - The x coordinate from where cropping will start.
        y - The y coordinate from where cropping will start.
        width - The width of the new cropped image.
        height - The height of the new cropped image.

      • negative

        public static void negative(MyImage img)
        This method will generate the negative of an image.
        Parameters:
        img - The image whose negative is generated.

      • sepiaTone

        public static void sepiaTone(MyImage img)
        This method will create sepia tone.
        Parameters:
        img - The image pixels to change.

      • pixelation

        public static void pixelation(MyImage img,
              int maskSize)
        This method will pixelate the image.
        Parameters:
        img - The image that is pixelated.
        maskSize - The size of the mask used to perform pixelation. Mask will be in square shape.
